title: Nyelo's Author Page
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:magazine]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[size 1%]]##transparent|.##[[/size]]

[[tabview]]
[[tab Who?]]
Hello friends, I'm [[*user Nyelo]].

I'm a computer nerd from Spain giving writing a chance. I'm non-binary and go by they/them in English. My interests are very volatile so I might go through long periods of no writing or reading SCP content so don't expect consistent content from me. But the SCP Foundation will always hold a special place in my heart.

The first time I heard about SCP was around 2019 or 2020 when I got recommended a video about [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-303 SCP-303]. After that, I watched more and more videos about SCP. I eventually found out about the wiki nad joined in 2021. However, I didn't post anything until early 2022.

[[/tab]]
[[tab Contributions]]

Moved temporarily below the tabs!

----

Please check out my other works at the [https://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/nyelo Wanderers' Library]!

[[/tab]]
[[tab Others]]
* My pronouns are they/them but I don't really mind any pronouns.
* I'm open for any collaborations, ideas or questions you might have! Hit me on the Wikidot PMs, I'll try to reply as soon as possible. Let it be known, I don't often check PMs if I'm not active (duh.)
* Check my [https://linktr.ee/nyelo Linktree] for my socials.
[[/tab]]
[[/tabview]]
